name: inter-ui
description: Font files for the Inter font family.
author: Rasmus Andersson (https://rsms.me)

scripts.copy: cp -a './temp/Inter Hinted for Windows/Web/' './Inter (web hinted)/' && cp -a './temp/Inter Web/' './Inter (web)/'
scripts.subset: npm run subset-hinted & npm run subset-unhinted
scripts.subset-unhinted: glyphhanger --subset='./temp/Inter Desktop/*.otf' --LATIN --formats=woff2,woff                    && cp -a './temp/Inter Desktop/' './Inter (web latin)/'                           && rename 's/-subset//' './Inter (web latin)/'*.woff*
scripts.subset-hinted: glyphhanger --subset='./temp/Inter Hinted for Windows/Desktop/*.ttf' --LATIN --formats=woff2,woff && cp -a './temp/Inter Hinted for Windows/Desktop/' './Inter (web hinted latin)/' && rename 's/-subset//' './Inter (web hinted latin)/'*.woff*
